instructions: In a large pot over medium heat, cook garlic in butter until brown.
Pour in water and bring to a boil.
Stir in bouillon granules, reduce heat and simmer a minimum of 20 minutes.
Stir in tomatoes, whisk in eggs and season with salt and pepper just before serving.
title: Garlic Soup
steps: In a large pot over medium heat, cook garlic in butter until brown. Pour in water and bring to a boil. Stir in bouillon granules, reduce heat and simmer a minimum of 20 minutes. Stir in tomatoes, whisk in eggs and season with salt and pepper just before serving.
